subject: Playoff Games
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Fresh off their exhilarating elimination of the Flyers in Game 7 on Wednesday, the Rangers stunned the Penguins on Friday in overtime, on Derick Brassard’s goal at 3 minutes 6 seconds.
snippet: Fresh off their exhilarating elimination of the Flyers in Game 7 on Wednesday, the Rangers stunned the Penguins on Friday in overtime, on Derick Brassard’s goal at 3 minutes 6 seconds.
